reviewText: I enjoyed watching it but it wasn't the same without Walter Payton!!!! I miss him!!! True Champion!!!  I'm glad I ordered it though.

Gave it my brother-in-law for Christmas! He watched it Christmas morning and enjoyed every minute of it.
Now I'm going to buy one for my husband
Poor quality video and camera-work.  But, it was great to see the coaches and players and hear a few (not enough!) stories.
